example_queries.members_with_email_catchall: SELECT * FROM demo_user.members WHERE email LIKE '%@catchallmail.com';
example_queries.members_signup_this_month: SELECT * FROM demo_user.members WHERE signup_date >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1);
example_queries.accounts_by_type: SELECT account_type, COUNT(*) FROM demo_user.accounts GROUP BY account_type;
example_queries.member_accounts_join: SELECT m.name, a.account_type, a.balance FROM demo_user.members m JOIN accounts a ON m.member_id = a.member_id;
example_queries.transactions_last_30_days: SELECT * FROM demo_user.transactions WHERE transaction_date >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1);
example_queries.total_balance_per_member: SELECT m.name, SUM(a.balance) as total_balance FROM demo_user.members m JOIN accounts a ON m.member_id=a.member_id GROUP BY m.name;
example_queries.avg_transaction_amount: SELECT AVG(amount) as avg_amount FROM demo_user.transactions;
example_queries.largest_transaction: SELECT * FROM demo_user.transactions WHERE amount = (SELECT MAX(amount) FROM demo_user.transactions);
example_queries.members_with_multiple_accounts: SELECT m.name, COUNT(a.account_id) as account_count FROM demo_user.members m JOIN accounts a ON m.member_id = a.member_id GROUP BY m.name HAVING COUNT(a.account_id) > 1;
example_queries.recent_members: SELECT * FROM demo_user.members WHERE signup_date >= SYSDATE - 30;
example_queries.recent_transactions_per_account: SELECT account_id, MAX(transaction_date) as last_transaction FROM demo_user.transactions GROUP BY account_id;
example_queries.members_and_transactions_join: SELECT m.name, t.amount, t.transaction_type, t.transaction_date FROM demo_user.members m JOIN accounts a ON m.member_id=a.member_id JOIN transactions t ON a.account_id=t.account_id;
example_queries.high_balance_accounts: SELECT * FROM demo_user.accounts WHERE balance > (SELECT AVG(balance) FROM accounts);
example_queries.members_with_email_gmail: SELECT * FROM demo_user.members WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
